lines.text: I wanna sin and suffer, and now I'm only sufferin'.
An international playboy. All the girls got 'em. I think they're cute.
No, no, you're spoiling everything! Here we make her the Purity Girl, the symbol of Youth and Purity, and you give her second-hand men. It won't do!
You're a bad woman... Re-Really a bad woman.
Me, that's what I'm thinking of! Me! Dens of iniquity, gambling, dives... That's what I want!
Oh, I don't care what color he is as long as he takes me to Harlem.

[speaking of Glory]
I'm afraid to leave her alone with the bellboy for fear she'll start talking the facts of life.
Now tell me everything. You can trust Elmerada. All the movie stars say, "You can trust Elmerada". I know them all. I eat with them, I sleep with them...
And men? H... H... How many?
